summary:
An ENB preset has paint-like looking, and it does show you new perspective of this game.
This ENB has best looking as it has been tweaked along with ELFX(Ehanced Lights and FX), Revamped exterior fog and AMD radeon VGA and asus vx239 monitor.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#d9d2e9][b][i][System requirements][/i][/b][/color]
- CPU: Anything better than i5 2nd generation.
- VGA: Anything better than gtx970(when set on maximum setting in skyrim.ini/skyrimpref.ini) and have more than 3gb vram.

[color=#d9d2e9][b][i][Mod requirements][/i][/b][/color]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]ELFX[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1627949]anamorfus
[/url]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930]Revamped exterior fog[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/219646]gargorias[/url]

[color=#d9d2e9][b][i]﻿﻿[Installing][/i][/b][/color]
1. Download basic ENB files of v.0.319 from [url=http://enbdev.com]http://enbdev.com[/url] and install it on Skyrim folder(steamlibrary/..../skyrim/).
2. Download  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23364?]SweetFX Shader Suite[/url] from Nexusmods and install it on the same path like above.
3. Download my ENB files from files section and uncompress it on the same path like above.
4. Overwrite downloaded files from step 1,2 with those from step 3(if ask you continue overwrite, click yes to all).

[i][b][color=#d9d2e9][Uninstalling][/color][/b][/i]
Delete all files added from Installing procedure.

[i][b][color=#d9d2e9][Compatibility][/color][/b][/i]
May occur minor visual issues with some mods.

[b][i][color=#d9d2e9][Visual mod recommendation or used in gallery][/color][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32426]Distant Decal Lod Animation ini Fix[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/191554]Tias
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/139369]32cm
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721/]Dynamic Distant Objects LOD - DynDOLOD[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3155782]sheson[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/743]HQ Snow Texture[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3038855]gorefest2011[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2947]Deadly Spell Impacts[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2463371]isoku
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41808]vurt
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30631]The Beauty of Skyrim - Caves and Mines[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2141127]raiserfx[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/]SMIM[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283020]Brumbek[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/]Pure Waters[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1213768]Laast[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/]Ultimate HD fire effects [/url]﻿by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/214871]rheadude[/url]

[b][i][color=#d9d2e9][Issues could be occurred]
[/color][/i][/b]1. With nvidia VGAs, for those who feel too dim when playing, you may need to tweak 'GammaCurve' or 'Brightness' in enbseries.ini file.
2. When gets high amount of stuttering or low frame, use SSAO tweak or other features like enboost which let you get more fps.

[b][i][color=#d9d2e9][Credits]
[/color][/i][/b]ENBseries by Boris Vorontsov
ENB DOF code by kingeric1992
ENB effects by HD6
ENB lens effects by kingeric1992
author: Drougr
